title: Improving the 'Dirty Page' Behavior in XML Report Designer Editor
description: When editing XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved. The problem lies in the fact that the user is not provided clear instructions on how to save or discard the changes. The error message itself is also not helpful as it is simply 'Source page is dirty.' Furthermore, the dialog box in which this error message is displayed is titled 'Error.'
OB: When attempting to switch from the 'source' view to the Layout view in the XML Report Designer editor after making edits in the XML, an error message is shown indicating that the changes need to be saved. However, it is not clear to the user how to save or discard the changes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the XML Report Designer editor.
2. Switch to the 'source' view.
3. Make edits to the XML.
4. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view.
5. Observe the error message that appears, which states that the changes need to be saved.
